name: Connect roads (WIP)
description:
Made in 3 days for mini jam 71.

Genres: racing and puzzle

Controls:

Puzzle: click on a tile to select it. Then use the right / left arrow to rotate it. You can also swap two tiles by clicking on two adjacent tiles. Use the cancel button to cancel your selection and the restart button to restart the level. Connect the car to the finish line to race! To get three stars, you need to make the minimum number of moves.

Race: arrows key to move.

Made in scratch, converted to html5 with forkphorus.

font: cooltext.com
